resources.string: In NORMAL mode, the script is available to read with no hidden text, and stats are not recorded. \n\nIn REHEARSAL mode, the selected character\'s lines will be hidden, and stats will be recorded.

Cue Words will colour relevent words red from the previous line delivered by another character, to help you remember the context of your current line. \n\n Not available when DISPLAY ONLY OWN LINES is toggled on.
The next page that is displayed will be chosen completely at random.
Here you will only display the lines delivered by your selected character. \n\n Not available when CUE WORDS is toggled on.
Toggling this will either hide or show the stage directions.
